short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will search titles on a Gobi page and display the number of matches found in NC State University Libraries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will search titles of the N.C. State University's library catalog and display matches on a Gobi page. 

Version 2.3 Updated the catalog query statement to reflect the recent system update.

Version 2.2  Added a regular expression to accommodate multiple linky running and changing the text display.
